description: EXECUTIVE STYLE 3 bedroom, 3 Bath, 3 level townhouse at prestigious PRIMROSE HILL in show-home condition in a tranquil & treed location on Burnaby Mountain! Major upgrades to the kitchen, wood flooring & steps, baseboards, custom faux-wood blinds & window coverings, granite countertop in kitchen with built in wall pantry, family room & nook, with a SF balcony off the dining room. Primary bedroom features double closets, remodelled ensuite with granite counter & soaker tub. Basement sports a newer full bathroom, laundry room, huge 250 foot crawl space storage area & large recreation room leading to a private treed patio. Rough-in vac and Double garage with ample storage. Close to schools, transit, SFU, golf course, parks, and trails for walking, cycling & hiking. 3 Pets allowed. Meas. appr.
